hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported that Allah's Messenger (may peace he upon him) forbade the selling and making a gift of the right of inheritance of a slave. Imam Muslim said:All the persons depend upon Abdullah b. Dinar in regard to this hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ الْوَلاَءِ، وَهِبَتِهِ،
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of selling or giving away the wala'
